#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
//#include<string.h>
char* decreasing_string(int k);
int isalpha(char c);
int calculate_k(char *a,int);
int main()
{	
	int test_cases=0,k,count;
	char *x;
//	isalpha('a');
	cin>>test_cases;
	for(int i=0;i<test_cases;i++)
	{
		cin>>k;
		x=decreasing_string(k);
		count=0;
		while(isalpha(x[count]))
		{
			cout<<x[count];
			count++;
		}
			cout<<"\n";
		
	}
	return 0;
}
int isalpha(char c)
{
//	cout<<(int)(c);
	if(c>=97 && c<=122)
		return 1;
	else
		return 0;
}

char* decreasing_string(int k)
{
	char *answer,*answer2;
	answer=new char[100];
	answer2=new char[100];

	int temp_k=k,count=0,count2=0;

	while(1)
	{
		if(temp_k>=26)
		{
			for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
			{
					answer[count]=(char)('a'+25-i);
					count=count+1;
			}
			temp_k=temp_k-25;
		}
		else
		{
			count2=0;
			for(int i=0;i<=temp_k;i++)
			{
				answer2[count2]=(char)('a'+temp_k-i);
				count2=count2+1;
			}

			for(int i=count2;i<count2+count+1;i++)
			{
				answer2[i]=answer[i-count2];
			}
			
			return answer2;	
		}
	}
	return answer;
}

int calculate_k(char *a,int len)
{
	int answer=0;
	for(int i=0;i<len-1;i++)
	{
		if(a[i]>a[i+1])
			answer++;
	}
	return answer;

}
